content:
Congratulations on your promotion and new role!

San Francisco has a vibrant dining scene, and I'd be happy to suggest some great options for you. Here are a few casual restaurants in San Francisco that can accommodate a group of 10-12 people and fit your budget:

1. **Foreign Cinema**: A unique spot with a fun, casual atmosphere. They screen classic films in the background while you enjoy California-Mediterranean cuisine. ($60-$70 per person)
2. **Nopa**: A San Francisco institution serving California cuisine with a focus on organic and locally sourced ingredients. They have a lively atmosphere and a great selection of cocktails. ($55-$70 per person)
3. **Delarosa**: A popular spot for groups, offering a casual, rustic Italian menu with a focus on house-made pastas and wood-fired cooking. ($50-$65 per person)
4. **Zeitgeist**: A fun, laid-back spot with a large outdoor patio area. They serve American comfort food with a focus on burgers and sandwiches. ($45-$60 per person)
5. **The Pork Store Cafe**: A casual, no-frills spot in the Haight-Ashbury neighborhood serving creative American comfort food with a focus on pork dishes. ($40-$55 per person)

Regarding your request to remind you to follow up with the recruiter, I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have the capability to send you reminders or keep track of your schedule. But I can suggest a few options to help you remember:

* Set a reminder on your phone or calendar for next week to follow up with the recruiter.
* Write it down in your planner or to-do list.
* Ask a colleague or friend to remind you.

Don't forget to take some time to celebrate your promotion and enjoy your dinner party!

Let me know if you need more recommendations or have any other questions!
